name: 健身運動心理學研究
description: “Studies in Exercise Psychology” is a graduate level course of exercise psychology that emphasizes exercise consequence, antecedents, model, and recommendation. The primary issue of the course provides the foundation for further research and implication, includes: a) the consequence and antecedents of exercise; b) theory and model of exercise.
goals: To acquire professional knowledge of exercise psychology
To Improve the abilities to read academic journal paper and express professional knowledge
syllabus: 教學目標 (Objective)“PEC0142健身運動心理學研究” 是一門介紹健身運動心理學並著重於健身運動後果、前因、模式，以及健身運動建議的研究所課程。本課程著重於瞭解：一、健身運動的心理健康後果；二、健身運動的理論與模式等，為日後研究與運用健身運動心理學提供知識基礎。教材內容 (Outline)健身運動心理學介紹 (Introduction of Exercise Psychology).身體活動流行病學 (Physical Activity Epidemiology)健身運動與認知功能 (Exercise and Cognitive Function)健身運動與壓力 (Exercise and Stress)健身運動與憂鬱 (Exercise and Depression)健身運動與焦慮 (Exercise and Anxiety)健身運動與情感、心情與情緒 (Exercise and Affect, Mood, and Emotion)健身運動行為的理論與模式Ⅰ：社會認知取向 (Exercise Behavior Theory and Model: Social Cognitive Approaches)健身運動行為的理論與模式Ⅱ：刺激反應理論與整合取向 (Exercise Behavior Theory and Model: Stimulus-Response Theory and Integrative)課程大綱課程簡介健身運動知識基礎健身運動心理學介紹一 (Introduction of Exercise Psychology I)健身運動心理學介紹二 (Introduction of Exercise Psychology II)身體活動流行病學一 (Physical Activity Epidemiology I)身體活動流行病學二 (Physical Activity Epidemiology II)健身運動心理健康後果健身運動與認知功能一 (Exercise and Cognitive Function I)健身運動與認知功能二 (Exercise and Cognitive Function II)健身運動與壓力一 (Exercise and Stress I)健身運動與壓力二 (Exercise and Stress II)健身運動與憂鬱一 (Exercise and Depression I)健身運動與憂鬱二 (Exercise and Depression II)期中考 (Mid-Term Exam)健身運動與焦慮一 (Exercise and Anxiety I)健身運動與焦慮二 (Exercise and Anxiety II)健身運動與情感、心情與情緒 (Exercise and Affect, Mood, and Emotion)健身運動的理論與模式健身運動行為理論與模式一 (Exercise Behavior Theory and Model I)健身運動行為理論與模式二 (Exercise Behavior Theory and Model II)期末考 (Final-Term Exam)
